# GKAccessPoint.Location.bottomTrailing

**Case**

The lower-right corner of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case bottomTrailing
```

## Corners

- **GKAccessPoint.Location.bottomLeading**: The lower-left corner of the screen.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location.topLeading**: The upper-left corner of the screen.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location.topTrailing**: The upper-right corner of the screen.
